metadata.name: Indirect Inline Command Execution Via Bash.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of Microsoft bash launcher with the "-c" flag. This can be used to potentially bypass defenses and execute Linux or Windows-based binaries directly via bash.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\bash.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\\\windows\\\\syswow64\\\\bash.exe'))) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('bash.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')))

output.summary: Detects execution of Microsoft bash launcher with the "-c" flag. This can be used to potentially bypass defenses and execute Linux or Windows-based binaries directly via bash.
